attributes.action: Make Ranjeev Johal grow and mantain his moustache
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know how great Ranj looks in a moustache however he adamantly refuses to grow it.  We petition the Prime Minister to make Ranj grow and mantain his moustache.  It is obviously the Prime Minister's decision as to how this can be enforced

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
